examples: I was treated with the utmost courtesy by the staff.
El personal me trató con la mayor cortesía.
We asked them, as a matter of courtesy, if we could photograph their house.
Les preguntamos, por cortesía, si podíamos fotografiar su casa.
It's only common courtesy to tell the neighbours that we'll be having a party (= the sort of behaviour that people would expect).
Es una cortesía común decirles a los vecinos que tendremos una fiesta (= el tipo de comportamiento que la gente esperaría).
an exchange of courtesies before the meeting
un intercambio de cortesías antes de la reunión
